content: Hello everyone, how do I represent billing provider in R4? I suppose field .provider with reference to organization should be used. Also another related question - is it true that semantics of .responsible in careTeam has changed since dstu3? Description says "Indicator of the lead practitioner" which is much more vague then "Billing provider" in dstu 3 spec :slight_smile:. I think right now .responsible means supervising provider on site rather than billing provider. Thanks!
@Paul Knapp ? (Also, @Tim Zallin, please raise issues in only one stream at a time.)
sure, just thought that implementers may be the wrong place for the question so resent it to financial stream
